Step-by-Step Instructions

Step 1 Connect your Twitter account

Connected: @bizo

Step 2 Add Easy Share to Chrome

Display your bookmarks bar (if hidden) by clicking Wrench Icon > Bookmarks > Show Bookmarks Bar

Step 3 Share links with your social audience

Click the Easy Share bookmark in your bookmarks bar to share the page you're viewing with your social followers.

The URL will be automatically shortened and added to your SmartLinks report.
